alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Jasper; Hampton; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, SCREVEN, BULLOCH, EFFINGHAM, CHATHAM, BEAUFORT, HAMPTON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 708 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Shirley to near Clyo to near Bay, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Pooler, Bluffton, Richmond Hill, Ridgeland, Springfield, Pembroke, Bellinger Hill Area, and Savannah International Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Coastal Jasper; Hampton; Inland Jasper
